name: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Gateway Braddock Community Corrections Center, Appellees

parties: Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Gateway Braddock Community Corrections Center, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of June, 2014, the above-eaptioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
93 A.3d 804
Clyde McGRIFF, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, and Gateway Braddock Community Corrections Center, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 9, 2014.
